title: Ed Miliband – 2023 Speech at Labour Party Conference
author: admin
summary: The speech made by Ed Miliband, the Shadow Secretary of State for Energy Security and Net Zero, in Liverpool on 9 October 2023.
content:
I want to thank my shadow ministerial team Sarah Jones, Kerry McCarthy, Jeff Smith and Alan Whitehead and it is a pleasure to follow my friend, our brilliant Scottish Labour leader Anas Sarwar.
